about.title: About Us
about.description1: EmpowerHer, an initiative by Women's Welfare Foundation, is a skill-building platform designed to empower individuals by teaching marketable skills and helping them turn these skills into income. We connect learners with opportunities to sell their products, fostering financial independence and self-reliance.
about.description2: Our mission is to bridge the gender gap in workforce participation and create pathways to economic independence for women across all backgrounds.

guidelines.title: Community Guidelines
rules: Be respectful and supportive of other community members
Share your knowledge and experiences to help others grow
Keep discussions relevant to women's empowerment and skill development
Respect privacy and confidentiality when sharing personal stories
Report any inappropriate content to our moderators

footer.missionText: We're dedicated to empowering women with the skills and opportunities they need to achieve economic independence and build a better future.
